comments.body: Microsoft has been concentrating their effort on their new Chromium-based Edge Preview browser for a long while, so upcoming Edge would be feature-wise on par with Chrome. Don't expect anything would be done on existing EdgeHTML based browser though, termination of its development effort has already been announced few months ago.
